The name of the Event Hubs Cluster.
All possible Cluster settings - a collection of key/value paired settings which apply to quotas and configurations imposed on the cluster.

Docs.summary: Replace all specified Event Hubs Cluster settings with those contained in the request body. Leaves the settings not specified in the request body unmodified.
